title: Table of attack spells and beams by maximum range
data:
***Version [0.5.2](/0.5.2 "0.5.2")**: This article is likely not up to date for the [latest stable release](/Current_release "Current release") of Crawl.*

Ranges for explosions are for the most distant affected square rather than the target point.

As of 0.5.2.

See also [List of attack spells and beams by maximum damage](/List_of_attack_spells_and_beams_by_maximum_damage "List of attack spells and beams by maximum damage").

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.5.2: This article is likely not up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

Ranges for explosions are for the most distant affected square rather than the target point.

See also List of attack spells and beams by maximum damage.
